sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SUBLIMATION, in chemiſtry, the condenſing and collecting, in a ſolid form, by means of vessels aptly conſtructed, the fumes of bodies raised from them by the application of a proper heat. See Chemistry, n⁰ 5-81.
SUBLIM.E, or Sublimity. See the article Grandeur and Sublimity
